sentences.en: " N " is a syllabic consonant in " button " .
sentences.cn: 在 button 这个词里n是 构成音节的辅音.

sentences.en: Describe the development of syllabic writing systems from pictographic system.
sentences.cn: 描述一下从图画系统到音节书写的发展过程.

sentences.en: Eskimos of the eastern arctic have a system of syllabic writing.
sentences.cn: 北极东部的爱斯基摩人有一套音节书写系统.

sentences.en: Finally, tone sandhi and tone patterns for three - syllabic word are discussed based on the experiment.
sentences.cn: 文章最后根据实验简述了三字词的变调规律和声调模式.

sentences.en: I heard that Kna in Japanese is a kind of syllabic language, is that so?
sentences.cn: 听说日文假名是一种音节文字, 是这样 吗 ?

sentences.en: In these two - syllabic words, there are 78 synonymous - paratactic multiple words , 25 additive and 13 other words.
sentences.cn: 双音节词中同义并列式复合词有78个, 附加式复合词25个,其它方式构词13个.

sentences.en: She is a scholar specializing in the syllabic script created by women in Jiangshui, Hunan.
sentences.cn: 她是一位专门研究女书的学者.

sentences.en: The complexity of the Chinese syllable structure is syllabic status of the prenuclear glides.
sentences.cn: 汉语音节结构的复杂性主要是其韵核前介音的归属问题.

sentences.en: There are four categories of predicative sentences with repeated mono syllabic verbs in Hui an dialect.
sentences.cn: 惠安方言单音动词重叠谓语句主要有四类.

words.tran_cn: 分成音节地；每音节地；藉著音节
划分音节；音节划分法（等于syllabification）
读出各个音节；使分成音节

trans.tran_en: based on or relating to  syllable s
